reviews.review: swet fest

I would say, the game is horrible developement wise. Plenty of bugs and hitbox issues. Although something about the game keeps you playing, even though it's the same thing over and over again, you still manage to get fun even after a long while of playing the game. That fact is what pushes me to recommend the game, although barely, as the developers hardly care about the game and more about the money.
As a horror fan, this game was a lot of fun. I don't know why this game is getting hate suddenly, but ok...

I have about 850 hours over PlayStation and PC combined. After playing for 3 years, I can say that BHVR are some lazy developers. Instead of fixing the laughable performance on console, they release another $10 skin pack. I will say that the devs have stumbled on to a very successful formula, and I hope that another game can compete. VHS looks to be a very strong competition to DBD.  I very much enjoy this game for some reason or other, but it's not for everyone. 
Lastly, this scum company is doing some sneaky business with NFTs, and I do not support it at all.

You get the game. You play it a lot. You have decent fun with it despite all the bugs. Then the lovely EasyAntiCheat will decide that you'll get bsod every time you try to log in, and you'll no longer be able to play, but you'll still watch videos of cheaters in game, cos that's how good they are at stopping cheaters in game.  

Also don't be fooled by the hours played time. You'll spend more time sitting in queue than actually playing.

If you your fetish is spaghetti code, and your goal poor mental health, go for it. This is the game for you!
game is a shell of what it once was.  the developers, the game, and those who support it have jumped the shark.   don't waste your money, there are plenty of other asymmetric horror games to play.

Играешь за сурва:
-Потеешь как собака сутулая
-Ныкаешься по самым незаметным углам, но всё равно попадаешься
-Не можешь дозавести ген до конца почти никогда
Играешь за мана:
-Не можень никого найти
-Так же потеешь как собака сутулая
-Если нашёл кого-то, тебя килляют на раз-два
-Все гены заводят за 5 минут
12 из 10 горящих пердаков Дэвида Кинга и Нюрсы
futuro menos trece

Played this game since release. It was once a fun game that I had good memories in, but boy has it fallen and has it fallen hard. I had a break from it and came back for the Halloween event, only to be disappointed of what has become of the game. The game once had fun chases and great interactions with killers but now, it's not the same, the new movement system, the new U.I. What once was a fun horror game to waste time in has become a sloppy excuse of a game, that just chucks out new content for more money without fixing the game itself. It's sad to see what once was a great game fall this hard.

For all it's faults, the game still offers a lot of fun, for both survivors and killers. Even killers from the vanilla version are a lot of fun to play as. Though I must warn you, at high MMR/rank this game can be sorta tilting and the probability of running into toxic players increases , so take that into account. But I can definitely recommend this to someone who looks for a horror experience, no, really=) The first 50 hours of solo q survivor were sorta scary.

이 게임만의 재미는 확실히 있음. 같이해도 생존자는 노잼이라 살인마만 했고 밸런스도 어쩌구 저쩌구도 헛소리. 어느쪽이던 이걸 진성으로 즐기려는 본인에게 문제가 있는거란 결론에 다다름.
Когда играешь за сурвов, кажется, что тебя заперли в комнате с тремя долбоёбами. Позже оказывается, что их пять, ведь все вы купили эту несбалансированную красоту, на которую разрабы положили болт
Gra sie upośledziła, cały czas wywala itp
I don’t recommend solo queuing. But if you play with friends, it’s super fun. It can be rage inducing sometimes but overall is a very fun well made game.

sehr gutes spiel

mittlerweile sehr nervig das Killer immer campen, man kommt mit knapp 50 stunden Spielzeit mit Leuten von 300 Stunden Spielzeit in eine Lobby, außerdem komme ich mit Leuten von höherem Level in eine Lobby gewinnen ist dadurch schwerer, sich raus zu winden ist eine 0,1% Chance.

Ansicht ist es ein gutes Spiel, es macht spaß mit Freunden zu spiele, aber meiner Meinung nach nach einer weile Geldverschwendung, trotzdem gebe ich für dieses Spiel noch Geld aus das sollte ich wohl mal überdenken.

Verbesserungsvorschläge:
- Gegner soll mich nicht mehr mit einem Perk aus 3 Milliarden Kilometer sehen
- winde zeit verkürzen 
- dem Spiel mehr nützliche Uptades zu geben anstatt neue Charaktere reinzustellen, man muss außerdem für ein ganzes kleidungs sat alleine schon 10€  bezahlen, bin ich reich oder was?

Ob ich das Spiel hiermit noch empfehlen kann bin ich mir unsicher.
